about_the_game:
Feel the vacation vibes! Turn your ordinary vacation videos into slideshows with effects, transitions, and titles.
Save your travel memories and share them with this vacation set. Create a travel journal, record a city guide, and tell about your waiting time at the airport. Use music tracks to create a camping trip atmosphere and apply exotic titles to tell a story.
In this set, you’ll find:
  • 150 titles
  • 47 stickers
  • 18 backgrounds
  • 45 transitions
  • 21 audio files

This DLC set is compatible with Movavi Slideshow Maker 8

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X® 10.10 or higher
  • Processor: 64-bit Intel® processor
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft® Windows® 7/8/10 with up-to-date patches and service packs installed
  • Processor: Intel®, AMD®, or compatible dual-core processor, 1.5 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® series 8, Intel® HD Graphics 2000, AMD Radeon™ R600 or higher graphics card with up-to-date drivers
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Feel the vacation vibes! Turn your ordinary vacation videos into slideshows with effects, transitions, and titles.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Dutch, Polish, Russian, Turkish, Japanese
